document.full_text: abc television on thursday announced it was canceling its long-running daytime soap operas "all my children" and "one life to live", hastening the demise of a genre marked by dramatic plot twists, cliffhangers and multiple generations of characters.
document.title: abc cancels "all my children", "one life to live"
lines_and_colors: abc television on thursday announced it was canceling its long-running daytime soap operas "all my children" and "one life to live", hastening the demise of a genre marked by dramatic plot twists, cliffhangers and multiple generations of characters.
